content: @Mario Carneiro @Simon Hudon Could one of you please take a look at this line: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/2554/files#diff-92b98102703f73caffdeddcf66864201R538

urh, yes that can be done better. The definition of split_wrt_composition is not good, and it makes the rest of the proofs tedious
it will take a bit to get an adequate replacement working
